readable.title: 172097783_292c5413d8
readable.content: A boy is wakeboarding on a lake with one hand . A man wearing a red life jacket is water-skiing across a bay . A surfer in blue shorts surfs over water . A young man dressed in blue swimming trunks and a red life jacket waterskiing in a blue lake . Boy in red vest and blue and white trunks on wakeboard .
